response.overview: Edward Wilson, the only witness to his father's suicide and member of the Skull and Bones Society while a student at Yale, is a morally upright young man who values honor and discretion, qualities that help him to be recruited for a career in the newly founded OSS. His dedication to his work does not come without a price though, leading him to sacrifice his ideals and eventually his family.
response.tagline: Edward Wilson believed in America, and he would sacrifice everything he loved to protect it.
response.title: The Good Shepherd

titles.title: The Good Shepherd - L'ombra del potere
特務風雲：中情局誕生秘辛
